attributes.action: personally ensure that Tulbahadur Pun VC is given full British citizenship immediately and access to medical support
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tulbahadur Pun VC is a hero amongst heroes, a role model to generations of soldiers.	
Yet Mr Pun, having served our country with such valour he was awarded the Victoria Cross, is now being denied the right to return to the UK to seek healthcare in his final years.
The treatment of the courageous Gurkhas who leave their home country to offer their lives for our freedom has always been second rate- but this just beggars believe. To add insult to injury, when he asked to have his VC (in a museum in the UK) sent to him so he could see it one last time, the museum refused.
The citation for his Victoria Cross can be found at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2338267828

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
